tool_description: Monitors real-time sensor data from vehicle's OBD system to observe current operating conditions and parameter values.
error_messages: Connection not active: OBD connection must be established before monitoring live data.
Invalid parameter names: One or more requested parameters not supported by vehicle.
Sampling rate too high: Vehicle cannot provide data at requested frequency.
Duration exceeds limits: Monitoring duration must be between 10 and 600 seconds.
usage: Ensure OBD connection is active, specify parameters to monitor with optional sampling rate and duration. Tool captures real-time sensor data streams.

parameter_values.description: Captured sensor values for each monitored parameter

value_ranges.description: Min and max values observed for each parameter

anomaly_flags.description: Whether abnormal values were detected for each parameter
